A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: At least it was sort of original? Other than that...story is hoaky\, dialogue is abysmal\, most of the acting seemed lazy and dispassionate\, somehow felt both rushed and slow at the same time\, timeline makes no sense\, way overdone CGI\, and more annoying things that just don't make sense (why do energy cannons show a clear parabolic arc\, much less in space?).
